author: unclematerial
name: Tout
description:
(Works with 1.6 and 1.4.)

This began with me, as a layman, wanting to change the Ubuntu font from the Cinnamon theme Baldr as I didn't like the presence of Ubuntu branding on a Mint desktop. I then started poking around with the hope of making the panel backgound more distinct, with a border (as to me a mere gradient or colour looks unfinished) and removing the boxes from both the panel and menus, which looked murky on my screen.

Hope my efforts are found to be clean, attractive and readable.
